issue.title: [C++][Docs] Add examples of Parquet TypedColumnWriter to user guide
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18239](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18239). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since this is the more performant non-Arrow way to write Parquet data, we should show that.
